about_the_game:
Be warned: Wobbly Construction is not a fun game - it's a challenge. It's difficult, unforgiving, and the controls are awkward. You'll experience hours of climbing, falling, failed jumps, and frustration. But if you reach the top of the tower, you'll feel an incredible sense of satisfaction.

Features:

  • Awkward third-person controls
  • Controller and keyboard/mouse support
  • A variety of annoying obstacles, such as wrecking balls, overturned ladders, and paint cans
  • Ragdoll physics for hilarious falls and interactions
  • A 150-meter-tall tower to climb
  • Multiple character skins to choose from

Watch your step!


The tower is very tall, and every misstep could lead to a big fall, so always watch your step. Be careful of scattered paint cans, brick pallets, overturned ladders, and all the other items carelessly thrown around by the construction workers on your way to the top.

Don't rush!


This climb will be more of a marathon than a sprint. Don’t be fooled by the seemingly simple obstacles you encounter, as even the easiest ones can turn out to be very punishing, so take your time! It’s better to wait a few seconds than to start the climb all over again. Patience is the key to success.

Reach the very top!


This journey will surely take you a long time. Along the way, you'll face much frustration from losing progress due to silly mistakes, but also joy when you finally overcome an obstacle and, ultimately, reach the top. Don’t get upset, don’t give in to emotions, stay calm, and you will surely make it to the summit!
